patthana2.5:1.1_0: Ganthaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca gantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— sīlabbataparāmāsaṁ kāyaganthaṁ

patthana2.5:204.1_2: ca domanassasahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ paṭighassa ca vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.

patthana2.5:205.1_2: ca lobho ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo; domanassasahagatā

patthana2.5:213.1_0: Ganthasampayutto ca ganthavippayutto ca dhammā ganthavippayuttassa dhammassa atthipaccayena
patthana2.5:213.1_1: paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ. Sahajātā—ganthasampayuttā
patthana2.5:213.1_2: khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo. Sahajātā—diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatā
patthana2.5:213.1_3: khandhā ca lobho ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo. Sahajātā—domanassasahagatā
patthana2.5:213.1_4: khandhā ca paṭighañca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo; diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatā
patthana2.5:213.1_5: khandhā ca vatthu ca lobhassa atthipaccayena paccayo; domanassasahagatā khandhā ca
